resources.string: Are you sure you want to purchase this buster?
Congratulations, you have saved the tree.\nYou spend
fFor this time you could save some trees in real life

In this game you need to save a digital tree from dying.

To save this tree you need to collect all binary numbers(like 100110) that are lost in decimals.

List of all binary numbers contain 40 groups of 25 numbers, when you collect a group you make one digital leaf alive.

Each leaf will help you to gain clicks when app is closed by adding numbers each minute.

In the shop you can buy enhancements.

Help to save this tree

Hello digital seeker, this is a clicker where you need to save a digital tree.

To save this tree you need to collect all binary numbers(numbers that consist only 1 and 0) that are lost in regular numbers.

List of all binary numbers contain 40 groups of 25 numbers, when you collect a group you make one digital leaf alive.

This is a clicker screen, here you can find this binary numbers by tapping on a screen and changing the value of a number, when you find one click "111101 111111" button to confirm it to the lost numbers list. The bottom panel will help you to reach desired screen just tap on icon you want.

This is a shop screen, here you can find enhancements that increase your tap value with \"x\" by multiplying your click by given number to find desirable number faster and decrease your click with \"d\" to come back to some value if you missed one.

This is a list if 40 groups of lost binary numbers, each group contain 25 lost numbers. When you collect all numbers in a group one digital leaf will be saved and will help you by adding \"1\" each minute when app is closed. You can click each group to look what numbers you need to find.

This is a screen with a digital tree you need to save. Now all leaves are empty and you need to collect all lost binary numbers to make them alive. Each leaf will help you gain clicks when app is closed.
While app was closed leaves gained +
